attorneys.attorney_label: LEAD ATTORNEY;ATTORNEY TO BE NOTICED;Bar Status: Government Attorney

charges.charge_description: 18:2113(a) BANK ROBBERY BY FORCE OR VIOLENCE(1-4)

charges.charge_disposition: 120 months US BOP; $400.00 SA; 36 months SR; Dft shall make restitution in the amount of $827.00 payable to the US District Clerk for distribution to World Savings and Loan. SUPERVISED RELEASE REVOKED: The Defendant is committed to the custody of the BOP for a term of 14 months to run concurrently.
